page.title: 12F.B.A.; LARTINGTON HALL
page.content:
they catch fish, tag, weigh and measure them, and the return them to the water. In general the work of the FBA in Teesdale is to help fishery managers and water engineers to maximise the good effects of man_made changes to rivers and to minimise the bad effects of such changes. The head of the Teesdale FBA is Mr. D Crisp who has 3 staff and a student to help him.
______________________________________
{LARTINGTON HALL { _______________ {The Withams of Lartington :} In 1635 Margaret Appleby married Thomas Maire of Hardwick. She was the Heiress to Lartington and because she and Thomas
